import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import './ProductDisplay.css'; import star_icon from '../../Components/Assets/star_icon.png'; import stardull_icon from '../../Components/Assets/star_dull_icon.png'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; const {addToCart} = useContext(Shop) return (

{product.name}

(122)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}

{product.description}

Select Size

S
M
L
XL
XXL

Category: {product.category}

) } export default ProductDisplay
